coverAlt: An abstract illustration of lungs and a subtitle that says the new science of a lost art
title: Breath
author: James Nestor
description: In 'Breath,' James Nestor delves into the science and art of breathing, revealing how this fundamental act impacts our health, well-being, and performance. Through captivating stories and research, Nestor explores ancient wisdom and modern science to uncover the secrets of optimal breathing for a healthier life.

title: Science of Breath: A Practical Guide
author: Swami Rama
description: In this comprehensive guide, Swami Rama explores the science of breath and its profound impact on health, wellness, and spiritual growth. Discover practical techniques and insights to harness the power of breath for a balanced and harmonious life.

title: The Creative Act: A Way of Being
author: Rick Rubin
